name: Roadtrip Thru Time
description:
In Roadtrip Thru Time, you are in control of a curious little car that can go backwards in time! But beware, altering the timeline too much can have catastrophic consequences...

Made for Kenney Jam 2018 in 79 hours. Theme: Time Travel. All assets from https://kenney.nl/assets, as was the whole twist of the jam.

Known issues: Sometimes the car gets stuck on the barrier when driving off the edge of higher elevation.

Source: https://github.com/Hegemege/roadtrip-thru-time

Gameplay / Walkthrough 

Controls: WASD / Arrows

Version log:

1.1: Fixed a bug that made the game impossible to complete if the player dies
